title: Questions to Ask Your Spouse During Tough Times
itunes:author: Guest: Dr. Larry Crabb
itunes:summary: The tough seasons of marriage can be windows of opportunity to touch your spouse's heart. The key is using those times as a chance for growth. John, Erin and Greg give some questions you can ask your spouse to help strengthen your relationship. Receive the book Fully Alive with your gift of any amount!
